body: 就跟你們死美語人說不准求翻譯，還不聽，你是不是欠扁

So from the translated series so far, one girl with bf got raped, blackmailed to keep getting raped, second girl tries to help, gets raped too, isn't blackmailed so now she tries to get the first girls bf for herself, i think she does so the first girl stays with the rapist
Pls translate in Englisch so we can understand
